casebody.data:
GERONTA FUNDING, a Delaware Statutory Trust, Defendant-Counterclaim Plaintiff Below, Appellant,
v.
BRIGHTHOUSE LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Counterclaim Defendant Below, Appellee. No. 103, 2019 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: March 15, 2019
Decided: March 28, 2019

REFUSED.
